metadata.description: Technically, Jeff Milligan and his minimal label Revolver records are based in Montreal, Canada. In reality though, this DJ nomad has spent most of the last decade touring all over the globe. On a recent stopover in Berlin, Jeff sat down to have a chat with Jay Haze about the restless life, Final Scratch, and his Irish heritage to kick off our audio interview series.
metadata.title: Interview with Jeff Milligan [txtnitv001]
metadata.subject: Textone
